name: Slicube
description:
Slicube is a simple cuberunner game, where you need good reflexes and a bit of rythm to succeed. This game is simply a better copy of Cubethon from Brackeys. This game not only have default Cubethon functions, but is looking amazingly smooth and beautiful. I'm already planning to add many things to this game as time moves on.

Keys:

  • use A or Left Arrow and D or Right Arrow to move
  • use Space to skip Credits
  • use Escape to open or close Pause Menu

Game is still heavily under developement, so if you don't like game as it is now, then don't forget to check up on it in future!
